title: Who dare question Allah?
transcript: many places Allah azzawajal repeats describing himself to do whatever he pleases this is the definition of Allah he does not answer to anyone he does not need to justify anything he owns everything in this universe if he were to throw all his creation and hellfire that would have been out of his Justice and if you who if he were to admit them all to his paradise that would be out of his generosity so we are in between these two things his Justice and his generosity
